title: test fails while installation
body:
by **greeshmakrish**: 
hi team,

we are trying to install go packages in ubuntu 10.4
mercurial version 1.8.3
while installing we got 2 errors with error message test fails.

test net
TEST FAIL net
make[1]: Entering directory `/home/greeshma/go/src/pkg/net'
gotest -test.short -test.timeout=120
rm -f _test/net.a
CGOPKGPATH= cgo --  cgo_linux.go cgo_unix.go
touch _obj/_cgo_run
8g  -o _gotest_.8 dial.go dnsmsg.go fd_linux.go hosts.go ip.go ipsock.go iprawsock.go
lookup.go net.go parse.go pipe.go sock.go tcpsock.go udpsock.go unixsock.go 
newpollserver.go fd.go file.go dnsconfig.go dnsclient.go port.go  _obj/cgo_linux.cgo1.go
_obj/cgo_unix.cgo1.go _obj/_cgo_gotypes.go dialgoogle_test.go dnsname_test.go
file_test.go hosts_test.go ip_test.go ipraw_test.go multicast_test.go net_test.go
parse_test.go pipe_test.go port_test.go server_test.go srv_test.go timeout_test.go
8c -FVw -I/home/greeshma/go/pkg/linux_386 -I . -o "_cgo_defun.8"
_obj/_cgo_defun.c
gcc -m32 -I . -g -fPIC -O2 -o _cgo_main.o -c   _obj/_cgo_main.c
gcc -m32 -I . -g -fPIC -O2 -o cgo_linux.cgo2.o -c   _obj/cgo_linux.cgo2.c
gcc -m32 -I . -g -fPIC -O2 -o cgo_unix.cgo2.o -c   _obj/cgo_unix.cgo2.c
gcc -m32 -I . -g -fPIC -O2 -o _cgo_export.o -c   _obj/_cgo_export.c
gcc -m32 -g -fPIC -O2 -o _cgo1_.o _cgo_main.o cgo_linux.cgo2.o cgo_unix.cgo2.o
_cgo_export.o  
cgo -dynimport _cgo1_.o >_obj/_cgo_import.c_ && mv -f _obj/_cgo_import.c_
_obj/_cgo_import.c
8c -FVw -I . -o "_cgo_import.8" _obj/_cgo_import.c
rm -f _test/net.a
gopack grc _test/net.a _gotest_.8  _cgo_defun.8 _cgo_import.8 cgo_linux.cgo2.o
cgo_unix.cgo2.o _cgo_export.o
--- FAIL: net.TestICMP (0.00 seconds)
	net.WriteToIP(..., ::1) = 0, write ip ::1: non-IPv4 address
FAIL
gotest: "./8.out -test.short=true -test.timeout=120" failed: exit status 1
make[1]: *** [testshort] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory `/home/greeshma/go/src/pkg/net'
make: *** [net.testshort] Error 1



kindly requested u to give a solution for our problem
